prototype.commodities.price
Class PricePanel

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Container
              |
              +--javax.swing.JComponent
                    |
                    +--javax.swing.JPanel
                          |
                          +--prototype.commodities.price.PricePanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class PricePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

The PricePanel displays all of the pricing information for a given commodity and its contracts in a table format.

Author:
J.R. Titko
See Also:
Serialized Form

 class PricePanel.PriceTableCellRenderer
          The cell renderer for laying out the appearence of individual JTable cells.

          The table model for laying out the JTable's appearance for displaying a commodity's information.
